effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Raises the target's [Defense]{mechanic:defense} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.
This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises [Defense]{mechanic:defense} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage} in battle.  Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text_entries.text:
戦闘中の　ポケモンの
防御を　それなりに　あげる。
ひっこめると　元に　戻る。

It sharply raises the Defense stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Aumenta molto la Difesa di un Pokémon in
una lotta. L’effetto svanisce se il Pokémon
è sostituito.

Aumenta mucho la probabilidad de asestar un
golpe crítico. Al cambiar de Pokémon, su efecto
desaparece.

Hebt den Verteidigungs-Wert eines Pokémon
im Kampf leicht an. Die Wirkung endet mit dem
Austausch des Pokémon.

Augmente un peu la Défense pendant un combat.
L’effet s’estompe si le Pokémon se retire.

배틀 중인 포켓몬의 방어를
그럭저럭 올린다. 포켓몬을 볼에
넣어버리면 원래대로 되돌아간다.

せんとうちゅうの　ポケモンの
ぼうぎょを　それなりに　あげる。
ひっこめると　もとに　もどる。

It sharply raises the Defense stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

It sharply raises the Defense stat
of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off
if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

Monte un peu la Défense pendant
un combat. L’effet s’estompe
si le Pokémon se retire.
